citations.title: [Ethics of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics]( (Stanford Encyclopedia)
[Fairness and Machine Learning]( (Barocas, Hardt, Narayanan - free online)
Browse [AI Ethics resources from Montreal AI Ethics Institute](
Analyze a dataset for bias (e.g., using [AI Fairness 360](
Read about [safety in autonomous systems]( (survey paper)
[Weapons of Math Destruction]( (Cathy O'Neil) - readable book on algorithmic harm
[Data Science Ethics]( (University of Michigan, Coursera - can audit free)
[Ethics of AI]( (University of Helsinki, edX - free)
**First paper to read**: ["Fairness and Abstraction in Sociotechnical Systems"]( (Selbst et al., FAT* 2019) - influential, readable
Browse [IEEE Robotics and Automation Society]( publications
**First paper to read**: ["Concrete Problems in AI Safety"]( (Amodei et al., 2016) - accessible overview, includes robotics examples
